pages.text: $(li)The Fortune enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_pickaxe)Pickaxe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_shovel)Shovel$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_hoe)Hoe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l).$(br)$(li)The enchanted pickaxe with this enchantment has a greater possibility of drop more items when ores like $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/lapis_lazuli)Lapis Lazuli$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone)Redstone$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamond$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emerald$(/l) are mined.
pages.title: Fortune

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_fortune)Ancient Tome (Fortune)$(/l).
